attributes.action: reject plans to offer Margaret Thatcher a state funeral which would be both wasteful and disrespectful to those who suffered under her rule and continue to do so
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Much press coverage has been given to the granting of a State funeral for Margaret Thatcher.  Whilst the death of any person is tragic it is shocking that the State should consider spending £3 million on the funeral of a woman who divided British society and whose divisions continue to plague those worst affected by her policies.  She once stated that 'there is no such thing as society'.  Why should we as a society, a concept she declared no belief in, fund her funeral?  Not with my taxes please Mr Brown - we have enough financial hardship as it is without wasting money on an event which will divide the British people.
